3x + 7x^2 = \\ &amp; \underline{\underline{x(3 + 7x)}} \end{aligned}â€‹3x+7x2=x(3+7x)â€‹â€‹â€‹ x2âˆ’16=(xâˆ’4)(x+4)\begin{aligned} &amp; x^2 - 16 = \\ &amp; (x - 4)(x + 4) \end{aligned}â€‹x2âˆ’16=(xâˆ’4)(x+4)â€‹ Forkorting av rasjonale uttrykk . | Ikke forkort med 4x, men faktoriser teller og nevner . | Fordi det ikke en faktor, det er flere ledd | . | . 4x+24x+6=2(2x+1)2(2x+3)=(2x+1)(2x+3)â€¾â€¾\begin{aligned} &amp; \dfrac{4x + 2}{4x + 6} = \\ &amp; \dfrac{2(2x + 1)}{2(2x + 3)} = \\ &amp; \underline{\underline{\dfrac{(2x + 1)}{(2x + 3)}}} \end{aligned}â€‹4x+64x+2â€‹=2(2x+3)2(2x+1)â€‹=(2x+3)(2x+1)â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹ . | Se om du kan faktorisere noe fÃ¸rst | . 4x+22xâˆ’6+3x3xâˆ’9=2â‹…4x+22xâˆ’6+3x3xâˆ’9\begin{aligned} \dfrac{4x + 2}{2x - 6} + \dfrac{3x}{3x - 9} = \\ \dfrac{\color{red}2 \cdot \color{white}4x + 2}{2x - 6} + \dfrac{3x}{3x - 9} \end{aligned}2xâˆ’64x+2â€‹+3xâˆ’93xâ€‹=2xâˆ’62â‹…4x+2â€‹+3xâˆ’93xâ€‹â€‹ a34â‹…66â‹…3âˆ’2â‹…(âˆ’643)2âˆ’273â‹…b24â‹…181\begin{aligned} \dfrac{\sqrt[4]{a^3} \cdot \sqrt[6]{6} \cdot 3^{-2} \cdot (\sqrt[3]{-64})^2}{\sqrt[3]{-27} \cdot \sqrt[4]{b^2} \cdot \sqrt{\dfrac{1}{81}}} \end{aligned}3âˆ’27â€‹â‹…4b2â€‹â‹…811â€‹â€‹4a3â€‹â‹…66â€‹â‹…3âˆ’2â‹…(3âˆ’64â€‹)2â€‹â€‹ 54312=\begin{aligned} \dfrac{\dfrac{5}{4}}{\dfrac{3}{12}} = \end{aligned}123â€‹45â€‹â€‹=â€‹ .

Readability(document.cloneNode(true)).parse()%3B%0A%0A%20%20function%20getFileName(fileName)%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20var%20userAgent%20%3D%20window.navigator.userAgent%2C%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20platform%20%3D%20window.navigator.platform%2C%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20windowsPlatforms%20%3D%20%5B'Win32'%2C%20'Win64'%2C%20'Windows'%2C%20'WinCE'%5D%3B%0A%0A%20%20%20%20if%20(windowsPlatforms.indexOf(platform)%20!%3D%3D%20-1)%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20fileName%20%3D%20fileName.replace('%3A'%2C%20'').replace(%2F%5B%2F%5C%5C%3F%25*%7C%22%3C%3E%5D%2Fg%2C%20'-')%3B%0A%20%20%20%20%7D%20else%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20fileName%20%3D%20fileName.replace('%3A'%2C%20'').replace(%2F%5C%2F%2Fg%2C%20'-').replace(%2F%5C%5C%2Fg%2C%20'-')%3B%0A%20%20%20%20%7D%0A%20%20%20%20return%20fileName%3B%0A%20%20%7D%0A%20%20const%20fileName%20%3D%20getFileName(title)%3B%0A%0A%20%20if%20(selection)%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20var%20markdownify%20%3D%20selection%3B%0A%20%20%7D%20else%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20var%20markdownify%20%3D%20content%3B%0A%20%20%7D%0A%0A%20%20if%20(vault)%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20var%20vaultName%20%3D%20'%26vault%3D'%20%2B%20encodeURIComponent(%60%24%7Bvault%7D%60)%3B%0A%20%20%7D%20else%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20var%20vaultName%20%3D%20''%3B%0A%20%20%7D%0A%0A%20%20const%20markdownBody%20%3D%20new%20Turndown(%7B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20headingStyle%3A%20'atx'%2C%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20hr%3A%20'---'%2C%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20bulletListMarker%3A%20'-'%2C%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20codeBlockStyle%3A%20'fenced'%2C%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20emDelimiter%3A%20'*'%2C%0A%20%20%7D).turndown(markdownify)%3B%0A%0A%20%20var%20date%20%3D%20new%20Date()%3B%0A%0A%20%20function%20convertDate(date)%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20var%20yyyy%20%3D%20date.getFullYear().toString()%3B%0A%20%20%20%20var%20mm%20%3D%20(date.getMonth()%2B1).toString()%3B%0A%20%20%20%20var%20dd%20%20%3D%20date.getDate().toString()%3B%0A%20%20%20%20var%20mmChars%20%3D%20mm.split('')%3B%0A%20%20%20%20var%20ddChars%20%3D%20dd.split('')%3B%0A%20%20%20%20return%20yyyy%20%2B%20'-'%20%2B%20(mmChars%5B1%5D%3Fmm%3A%220%22%2BmmChars%5B0%5D)%20%2B%20'-'%20%2B%20(ddChars%5B1%5D%3Fdd%3A%220%22%2BddChars%5B0%5D)%3B%0A%20%20%7D%0A%0A%20%20const%20today%20%3D%20convertDate(date)%3B%0A%0A%20%20const%20fileContent%20%3D%20%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%22author%3A%3A%20%22%20%2B%20byline%20%2B%20%22%5Cn%22%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%2B%20%22source%3A%3A%20%5B%22%20%2B%20title%20%2B%20%22%5D(%22%20%2B%20document.URL%20%2B%20%22)%5Cn%22%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%2B%20%22fetched%3A%3A%20%5B%5B%22%20%2B%20today%20%2B%20%22%5D%5D%5Cn%22%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%2B%20%22published%3A%3A%20%5Cn%22%20%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%2B%20tags%20%2B%20%22%20%5Cn%5Cn%22%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%2B%20markdownBody%3B%0A%20%20%0A%20%20document.location.href%20%3D%20%22obsidian%3A%2F%2Fnew%3F%22%0A%20%20%20%20%2B%20%22file%3D%22%20%2B%20encodeURIComponent(folder%20%2B%20fileName)%0A%20%20%20%20%2B%20%22%26content%3D%22%20%2B%20encodeURIComponent(fileContent)%0A%20%20%20%20%2B%20vaultName%20%3B%0A%7D)%7D)()%3B To grab the contents of a page and add it to the clippings folder . javascript: Promise.all([import('https://unpkg.com/turndown@6.0.0?module'), import('https://unpkg.com/@tehshrike/readability@0.2.0'), ]).then(async ([{ default: Turndown }, { default: Readability }]) =&gt; { /* Optional vault name */ const vault = ""; /* Optional folder name such as "Clippings/" */ const folder = "Clippings"; /* Optional tags */ const tags = "#clippings"; function getSelectionHtml() { var html = ""; if (typeof window.getSelection != "undefined") { var sel = window.getSelection(); if (sel.rangeCount) { var container = document.createElement("div"); for (var i = 0, len = sel.rangeCount; i &lt; len; ++i) { container.appendChild(sel.getRangeAt(i).cloneContents()); } html = container.innerHTML; } } else if (typeof document.selection != "undefined") { if (document.selection.type == "Text") { html = document.selection.createRange().htmlText; } } return html; } const selection = getSelectionHtml(); const { title, byline, content } = new Readability(document.cloneNode(true)).parse(); function getFileName(fileName) { var userAgent = window.navigator.userAgent, platform = window.navigator.platform, windowsPlatforms = ['Win32', 'Win64', 'Windows', 'WinCE']; if (windowsPlatforms.indexOf(platform) !== -1) { fileName = fileName.replace(':', '').replace(/[/\?%*|"&lt;&gt;]/g, '-'); } else { fileName = fileName.replace(':', '').replace(///g, '-').replace(/\/g, '-'); } return fileName; } const fileName = getFileName(title); if (selection) { var markdownify = selection; } else { var markdownify = content; } if (vault) { var vaultName = '&amp;vault=' + encodeURIComponent(`${vault}`); } else { var vaultName = ''; } const markdownBody = new Turndown({ headingStyle: 'atx', hr: '---', bulletListMarker: '-', codeBlockStyle: 'fenced', emDelimiter: '*', }).turndown(markdownify); var date = new Date(); function convertDate(date) { var yyyy = date.getFullYear().toString(); var mm = (date.getMonth()+1).toString(); var dd = date.getDate().toString(); var mmChars = mm.split(''); var ddChars = dd.split(''); return yyyy + '-' + (mmChars[1]?mm:"0"+mmChars[0]) + '-' + (ddChars[1]?dd:"0"+ddChars[0]); } const today = convertDate(date); const fileContent = "author:: " + byline + "
" + "source:: [" + title + "](" + document.URL + ")
" + "fetched:: [[" + today + "]]
" + "published:: 
" + tags + " 

" + markdownBody; document.location.href = "obsidian://new?" + "file=" + encodeURIComponent(folder + fileName) + "&amp;content=" + encodeURIComponent(fileContent) + vaultName ; }) . javascript:(function()%7Bjavascript%3A(function()%20%7B%0Aconst%20vault%20%3D%20%22%22%3B%0Aconst%20folder%20%3D%20%22Clippings%2F%22%3B%0Aconst%20tags%20%3D%20%22%23pocket%22%3B%0A%0Aconst%20vaultName%20%3D%20vault%20%3F%20%60%26vault%3D%24%7Bvault%7D%60%20%3A%20''%3B%0A%0Aconst%20cleanAndExtractHostName%20%3D%20url%20%3D%3E%20%7B%0A%20%20url%20%3D%20new%20URL(url).hostname%3B%0A%20%20return%20url.replace(%2F%5B%5Ea-zA-Z%20%5D%2Fg%2C%20'')%3B%0A%7D%0A%0Aconst%20path%20%3D%20window.location.pathname.split('%2F').filter(el%20%3D%3E%20%7B%20return%20el%20%7D).join('-')%3B%0Aconst%20urlname%20%3D%20cleanAndExtractHostName(document.URL)%3B%0Aconst%20title%20%3D%20path%20%3F%20path%20%3A%20urlname%3B%0A%0Afunction%20convertDate(date)%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20var%20yyyy%20%3D%20date.getFullYear().toString()%3B%0A%20%20%20%20var%20mm%20%3D%20(date.getMonth()%2B1).toString()%3B%0A%20%20%20%20var%20dd%20%20%3D%20date.getDate().toString()%3B%0A%20%20%20%20var%20mmChars%20%3D%20mm.split('')%3B%0A%20%20%20%20var%20ddChars%20%3D%20dd.split('')%3B%0A%20%20%20%20return%20yyyy%20%2B%20'-'%20%2B%20(mmChars%5B1%5D%3Fmm%3A%220%22%2BmmChars%5B0%5D)%20%2B%20'-'%20%2B%20(ddChars%5B1%5D%3Fdd%3A%220%22%2BddChars%5B0%5D)%3B%0A%7D%0Avar%20date%20%3D%20new%20Date()%3B%0Aconst%20now%20%3D%20convertDate(date)%3B%0A%0Aconst%20fileContent%20%3D%0A%20%20%20%20%60source%3A%3A%20%5B%24%7Btitle%7D%5D(%24%7Bdocument.URL%7D)%5Cn%60%0A%20%20%2B%20%60fetched%3A%3A%20%5B%5B%24%7Bnow%7D%5D%5D%5Cn%60%0A%20%20%2B%20tags%20%2B%20'%20'%0A%20%20%0Adocument.location.href%20%3D%20%22obsidian%3A%2F%2Fnew%22%2B%60%3Ffile%3D%24%7BencodeURIComponent(folder%2Btitle)%7D%60%2B%60%26content%3D%24%7BencodeURIComponent(fileContent)%7D%60%2B(vaultName%3FvaultName%3A'')%3B%0A%7D)()%3B%7D)()%3B . javascript:(function() { const vault = ""; const folder = "Clippings/"; const tags = "#pocket"; const vaultName = vault ? `&amp;vault=${vault}` : ''; const cleanAndExtractHostName = url =&gt; { url = new URL(url).hostname; return url.replace(/[^a-zA-Z ]/g, ''); } const path = window.location.pathname.split('/').filter(el =&gt; { return el }).join('-'); const urlname = cleanAndExtractHostName(document.URL); const title = path ? path : urlname; function convertDate(date) { var yyyy = date.getFullYear().toString(); var mm = (date.getMonth()+1).toString(); var dd = date.getDate().toString(); var mmChars = mm.split(''); var ddChars = dd.split(''); return yyyy + '-' + (mmChars[1]?mm:"0"+mmChars[0]) + '-' + (ddChars[1]?dd:"0"+ddChars[0]); } var date = new Date(); const now = convertDate(date); const fileContent = `source:: [${title}](${document.URL})
` + `fetched:: [[${now}]]
` + tags + ' ' document.location.href = "obsidian://new"+`?file=${encodeURIComponent(folder+title)}`+`&amp;content=${encodeURIComponent(fileContent)}`+(vaultName?vaultName:''); })(); . Other stuff: . 13.title: Obsidian
13.content: Obsidian customization . Settings . Editor . Files &amp; Links . Appearance . Iâ€™ve tried pretty much every theme up to this point, but Chetachiâ€™s Yin and Yang theme (based off of California Coast) is by far the most customizable and best integrated (also updated frequently). California Coast and Minimal are also decent, but from my experience both have tiny problems that donâ€™t appear in Yin and Yang. CSS Snippets . CSS snippets are placed in &lt;VaultRoot&gt;/.obsidian/snippets/&lt;Snippet Name&gt;.css. After adding the file, reload the snippets in obsidian and enable them. Folder Arrows for Folder Notes . /* * Show folder arrow (&gt;) only for folders with a folder note. */ .nav-folder:not( .alx-folder-with-note) .nav-folder-title .collapse-icon { display: none !important; } .nav-folder .alx-folder-with-note &gt; .nav-folder-title .collapse-icon { display: inline-block !important; } .nav-folder .alx-folder-with-note:not( .alx-folder-with-note) .nav-folder-title .nav-folder-title-content::before { display: inline-block !important; } .nav-folder .alx-folder-with-note &gt; .nav-folder-title .nav-folder-title-content::before { display: none !important; } . Settings Tweaks .setting-item-description { max-height: 0; transition: max-height 0.25s ease-out; overflow: hidden; } .setting-item-info:hover .setting-item-description { max-height: 100px; transition: max-height 0.40s ease-in; } .setting-item { padding-top: 10px; padding-bottom: 10px; } div.modal.mod-settings { transition: .3s; position: fixed; top: 5%; width: 90%; height: 90%; } div.modal.mod-settings:not(:hover) { height: 20%; } . Installing and updating themes . The installation/update procedure is the same, go to Settings &gt; Appearance &gt; Community themes &gt; Browse, look for the theme you want, and press Use. Customizing themes . Some themes (like Yin and Yang) are integrated into the Style Settings plugin, and some have their own plugin. Theming Obsidian Publish . The easiest way of theming Obsidian Publish is to simply copy your obsidian theme. Copy the theme css file to your vault and name it publish.css, then publish it using the in-app modal. For the Yin and Yang theme this would be cp &lt;VaultRoot&gt;/.obsidian/themes/Yin\ and\ Yang.css &lt;VaultRoot&gt;/publish.css. Other things . Templates . | _templates/ABC Markup â€” EZ LaTeX and markdown formatting. Download the file and put it in _templates. Instructions are found in the template file. HIGHLY recommend the Hotkeys for Templates plugin to bind this template to a key. | . Plugins . Core plugins . | File explorer | Search | Quick switcher | Graph view | Backlinks | Outgoing links | Tag pane | Page preview | Daily notes | Templates | Note composer | Command palette | Starred | Markdown formatter importer . | Enable on-demand. | . | Zettelkasten prefixer | Random note | Outline | Word count . | Replaced by community plugin. | . | Slides . | Just bad. | . | . Community plugins . To install community plugins, go to Settings &gt; Community plugins &gt; Browse. Make sure Safe mode is off. | Advanced Tables | AidenLxâ€™s Folder Note . | Folder Note Core | . | Annotator | Banner | Better File Link | Better footnote | Better Word Count | Block Reference Counter | Buttons | Calendar | Checklist | Citations | cMenu . | Hide (bottom right). | . | Comments | Consistent attachments and links | Contextual Typography | Copy Block Link | CSV Editor | Customizable Sidebar | Dangling links | Dataview | Diagrams | Dictionary | Discord Rich Presence | Dual (not in community plugin list) | Editor Syntax Highlight | Emoji Shortcodes | Emoji Toolbar | Excalidraw | Export To Tex | Extended Context Menu (deprecated, not in community plugin list) | Extended MathJax | Extension Handler (not in community plugin list) | Focus Mode | Footlinks | Footnote Shortcut | Gist | Go to Line | Hide Sidebars When Narrow | Hider (disabled) | Hotkey Helper | Hotkeys for templates | Hotkeys++ | Hover External Link Plugin | Indentation Lines | ini Editor | Jupyter plugin | Kanban | LanguageTool Integeation | Linter | Maximise Active Pane | MetaEdit | Metatable | Natural Language Dates | Note Refactor | Obsidian Git | obsidian markmind | Obsidian42 - Jump-to-Date | Ozan's Image in Editor Plugin | Pandoc Plugin | Paste URL into selection | Plugin Changelogs | Quick Explorer | Quick Switcher++ | QuickAdd | Recent Files | Rich Links | Search on Internet | Show Whitespace | Sliding Panes (Andy's Mode) | Smart Typography | Tag Wrangler | Taskbone OCR | Tasks | Templater | Text Snippets | Tidy Footnotes | Todoist Plugin (for todoist users) | Zoom | Style Settings | . Advanced Tables . | Setting | Value | . | Bind enter to table navigation | true | . | Bind tab to table navigation | true | . | Pad cell width using spaces | true | . | Show icon in sidebar | false | . AidenLxâ€™s Folder Note . â„¹ï¸ Requires Folder Note Core . Calendar . Consistent attachments and links . Customizable Sidebar . Dictionary . Discord Rich Presence . Excalidraw . Men vi kan tvinge elektronene til Ã¥ gÃ¥ motsatt vei ved hjelp av elektrisk energi. Fremstille metaller . Oks: $2Cl^-$ -&gt; $Cl2(g)$ + $2e^-$ Red:$Cu^{2+}$ + $2e^-$ -&gt; $Cu$ -&gt; $Cl2(g)$ + $Cu$ . -&gt; . Oppgis i ampere timer ($Ah$). Et godt batteri bÃ¸r ogsÃ¥ ha ==lav indre motstand==. Indre motstand = den motstanden ionene mÃ¸ter i elektrolytten inne i batteriet, og som vi merker som varmeutvikling i batteriet.
